modName: SkyRe USKP Non silver weapon attack Undead fire fix. - DELETED
summary: Non silver weapon attack Undead fire fix.
descriptionHtml:
I'm not good at english.
Non silver weapon attack Undead fire fix.

Required
USKP 2.0.2 (and more)
T3nd0s Skyrim Redone


cause
USKP quotation
Script Fixes
The silver weapons script has been modified to add the perk to the player and then leave it alone after that. The actual perk has already been designed properly to check for the use of silver weapons. This also fixes a bug where dual-wielding two silver weapons and then unequipping one of them would remove the perk even if the other weapon was still equipped. (Bug #14604)
